      • flowAbrupted

        public final void flowAbrupted()
        Stops control flow, used for break, next, redo, continue

      • addPendingEdge

        public void addPendingEdge(PsiElement pendingScope,
                           Instruction instruction)
        Adds pending edge in pendingScope Pending instruction are used when you have several branches from previous statement Also you can add a pending instruction for the 'exit point' of the all scope
        Parameters:
        pendingScope - Scope for instruction / null if expected scope = exit point
        instruction - "Last" pending instruction

      • checkPending

        public final void checkPending(Instruction instruction)
        Creates edges from the pending list to the specified instruction.
        Parameters:
        instruction - target instruction for pending edges

      • startNode

        public Instruction startNode(PsiElement element)
        Creates instruction for given element, and adds it to the instructions stack
        Parameters:
        element - Element to create instruction for
        Returns:
        new instruction

      • startTransparentNode

        public final TransparentInstruction startTransparentNode(PsiElement element,
                                                         java.lang.String markerName)
        Creates transparent instruction for given element, and adds it to the instructions list Transparent instruction will be replaced in the result control flow by direct connection between predecessors and successors
        Parameters:
        element - Element to create instruction for
        markerName - name for debug information
        Returns:
        new transparent instruction

      • startConditionalNode

        public final Instruction startConditionalNode(PsiElement element,
                                              PsiElement condition,
                                              boolean result)
        Creates conditional instruction for given element, and adds it to the instructions stack
        Parameters:
        element - Element to create instruction for
        Returns:
        new instruction
